beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* polls a jms queue * writes data to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that subscribes to jms
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config subscriber.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar jbossall-client.jar (this is not distributed with openadaptor)
This example relies on a default instance of jboss running (http://www.jboss.org) on the same machine that the example is being run.
To verify that this is working you need put some data on the queue, the corresponding publisher example should do this.
